title: Ahaz’s Wickedness and Defeat
summary: Ahaz leads Judah into deep idolatry, even sacrificing his own sons. God allows Judah to be defeated by Israel, Syria, and Edom. Despite suffering, Ahaz becomes more unfaithful and closes the temple.

faq.question: How did Ahaz dishonor God?
faq.answer: He worshipped idols, sacrificed his children, and shut the temple doors.

faq.question: What were the consequences of Ahaz’s actions?
faq.answer: Judah suffered military defeats and deep spiritual decline.
